Nutrition Home Nutrition Eating healthy at fast food restaurants Fast food tips Fast food tips
Order garden or grilled chicken salads with low-fat dressings. Limit fried foods (french fries, onion rings, or fried chicken and fish). Choose grilled chicken. Order a plain burger without cheese and bacon. Buy the smallest sandwich on the menu. Use mustard or ketchup, which have less fat than mayonnaise. Order water or low-fat or fat-free milk. Pick vegetable toppings for your pizza, such as peppers, mushrooms, onions, and tomatoes. Or, try pizza without cheese.
